title: Amy's Gangbang Love Story
description: Amy loves her possessive Master but there is one problem...he doesn't like to share. Amy has dreamed of a gangbang for years and is desperate to experience her fantasy, just once. She doesn't want to lose her sexy Master, but she'll never be able to settle down with him until she has lived the dream. Little does she know, that her Master is well aware of her desires and has something very special planned for her birthday . . .
author: Nikki Sex
